title: INSTALOCKERS!
body: OCE normals there is no draft pick and there are these 12 year olds that have an ego bigger than dravens crits that have the oddesity to instalcok after they didn't get the role and say "whoops looks like I'm mid cause i locked in" O_O wut is this! why am i not able to or have the chance to report them for this. RITO! Why

replies.body: OK i get it i spelled it wrong don't have to point it out i was pissed off when i wrote this

I've never seen the problem with instant locking. If you wanted proper discussion and everything you should play draft.

However I know that in OCE we don't have draft so that's kind of a useless statement.

1. I'm not saying they don't have an ego but how does instalocking and saying "whoops looks like I'm mid cause i locked in" showcase their said ego.
2. **_oddesity_**
So u say i instalock too?
